title: Busted Steel
description: She’s the forbidden fruit, and I’m her dirty fantasy.Four years ago, she kissed me. She said she was nineteen. She wasn’t even close. To make it even worse, she’s daddy’s little princess.Then, a year ago, I was hired to head a security team for her out-of-control younger sister while on a world tour with the band Foreplay. I vowed to stay away from her, becoming a shadow in the dark whenever she was around.Now she’s been hired to photograph her sister’s sixty-day honeymoon, all around the world.She’s not a little girl anymore. She makes damn sure I notice that, too. But I’m still the same man.Falling is not an option. However, each day, she’s making it harder and harder to avoid.I promised myself not to break her heart, yet mine lies in busted pieces all over the world.
author: M.J. Fields
